name: AffirmationBear
0:
”Alexa, open Affirmation Bear”
”Alexa, ask Affirmation Bear for a random affirmation”
”Alexa, ask Affirmation Bear to give me love energy”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: affirmation bear
des:
AffirmationBear provides a daily uplifting affirmation that is crafted each day based on the actual astrological alignment of the day!

The AffirmationBear skill provides a daily uplifting affirmation for you to take throughout the day. Meant to help you bring a positive focus on your day based on actual astrological alignments that we analyze on a daily basis in conjunction with our sister skill, AstrologyBear! 

Even though our daily affirmation is crafted for that day, you can request a random one from the past also by asking "Alexa, ask AffirmationBear for a random affirmation"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
